entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:39 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
